orig_text:
Listen for Connection on L                RTS, U, L, l
     STR, L, U, 32                                    A
correct_text:
Listen for Connection on L
                                            RTS, U, L, l
                                                        A
STR, L, U, 32
notes:
I do not have a scan of the original printed RFC to check, but I believe there may have been
a transcription error when the ASCII text version of this RFC was prepared. (Either that, or
the typed original contained a formatting error.)

The issue is that there is a time delay (perhaps a considerable one) between the "Listen" and
the sending of the STR (which is necessarily a reply to the RTS message).
The inclusion of the blank line makes this timing/ordering clear(er).
